alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 1:56AM AKST until January 19 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Expect blowing snow, with visibility one half mile or less at times. West winds gusting as high as 45 mph, strongest near Kaktovik. * WHERE...Prudhoe Bay to Kaktovik. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility in blowing and drifting snowfall creating difficult travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast
